”Alexa, open Calm My Dog”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm my dog
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CALM MY DOG Since you can't be with your dog all of the time this skill provides relaxing music especially chosen to calm and keep your dog company. Listening to slow tempo classical music can reduce stress and have a positive effect on dogs. The calming classical, simple music will constantly play whilst you are out, or until you choose to stop. HOW TO USE Before first use, enable the skill by pressing the Enable button in the Skill Store, then say "Alexa, open Calm My Dog" to begin. To finish, say "Alexa, stop". PREMIUM VERSION The Premium version allows you to treat your dog to an enhanced calming experience with the following added features:
+ Premium sound quality
+ Enhanced looping (every 3 hours instead of every 1 hour) for increased variety.
It allows your dog to remain relaxed for longer and provides company whilst you are away. FEEDBACK Connect with us at http://www.hero-software.co.uk
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
